summary.title: Java 25 Runtime Now in Preview
summary.summary: The Java 25 runtime is now available in preview for App Engine flexible environment. This update provides access to the latest Java features and improvements.

2025-08-07.content: To increase security, starting in March 2025, support for Transport Layer Security (TLS) version 1.1 and earlier is deprecated. [Update your application settings](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/flexible/secure-minimum-tls) in the App Engine flexible environment to use TLS version 1.2 and later, along with a corresponding secure set of cipher suites (Preview).

summary.title: TLS Deprecation Update
summary.summary: Starting March 2025, TLS 1.1 and earlier are deprecated. Update your App Engine settings to use TLS 1.2 or later.
